CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14-17 A variety of good donor moieties , including oligothiophenes , 18-23 carbazole , 24 benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene , 25-27 and dithienosilole , 14,28 have been demonstrated as useful for low band gap polymers ; good acceptor moieties including thieno- [3,4-b]thiophenes substituted with electron - withdrawing groups , 29-31 N-alkylthieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione , 25,28 benzothiadiazole , 24,32 and 2,5-bis(2-alkyl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-(2H,5H)-dione 33-36 have been developed.

Let's think step by step.

1. oligothiophenes
2. carbazole
3. benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene
4. dithienosilole
5. thieno-[3,4-b]thiophenes
6. N-alkylthieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione
7. benzothiadiazole
8. 2,5-bis(2-alkyl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-(2H,5H)-dione

These are the Material Name entities mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. oligothiophenes
2. carbazole
3. benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene
4. dithienosilole
5. thieno-[3,4-b]thiophenes
6. N-alkylthieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione
7. benzothiadiazole

These are the Material Name entities mentioned in the paragraph that clearly refer to specific chemical compounds or materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| oligothiophenes |
| carbazole |
| benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b′]dithiophene |
| dithienosilole |
| thieno-[3,4-b]thiophenes |
| N-alkylthieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione |
| benzothiadiazole |

3. good acceptor moieties: thieno-[3,4-b]thiophenes, N-alkylthieno [3,4-c]pyrrole-4,6-dione, benzothiadiazole, 2,5-bis(2-alkyl)pyrrolo [3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-(2H,5H)-dione

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as "Material Property" entities, as they refer to the specific chemical properties of the moieties mentioned in the text.
